attributes.action: Ban religious organisations from cold calling at our homes and acosting people in the streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I applaud the government for banning cold calling techniques, but there as been no mention of this bad practice being outlawed for religious organisations. I am totally fed up with dictating religious people coming to my door and trying to force feed me with fiction and myth... Please make sure that you include all the religious organisations in the cold calling ban.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
